author: philip
msg: Add multi-threading to svnserve.  Whether threads are used is a
run-time decision.  Platforms with threads but not fork (Windows)
will use threads by default, platforms with both threads and fork
(main): Add multi-thread mode.  Add -F/-T/-S options to select fork,

author: cmpilato
msg: sucker isn't NULL, the path-based editor driver will think we
opened a directory, which, in fact, we did not.  Thanks to Philip

author: cmpilato
msg: Fixes to minor annoyances in recent commits, reported by Garrett Rooney
(svn_path_condense_targets): We're not gonna put anything into this
array, so start it with zero elements (instead of one unused one).

author: cmpilato
msg: (svn_path_condense_targets): Add an easy out for the single input
